SELECT A.p_id as pId, A.name, A.created_at as createdAt, A.updated_at as updatedAt, A.content, A.category_id as categoryId, A.user_id as userId, A.started_at as startedAt, A.ended_at as endedAt, A.started_price as startedPrice, A.bid_increment as bidIncrement, A.status, (select nickname from users as B where B.USER_ID=A.USER_ID) as nickname, (select category_name from category as C where C.category_id=A.category_id) as categoryName FROM product as A WHERE status='승인대기중' OR status='승인완료' OR status='승인반려' ORDER BY A.created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{amount}
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET status='승인완료' WHERE p_id = #{pId}
UPDATE product SET status='승인반려' WHERE p_id = #{pId}
